Name: Wish You Were Here
Description:
Dianxiao is finally opening her Fan Drawing Stall. Go visit it.

Unlock a new Companion after completing this quest.
QuestDesc:
Dianxiao is finally opening her Fan Drawing Stall. Go visit it.

Unlock a new Companion after completing this quest.

Dialogues.Speaker: Dianxiao
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Wait! Zhezhi, don't tell me you plan on finishing all that by yourself?

Dialogues.Speaker: Zhezhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes.

Dialogues.Speaker: Dianxiao
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But there are so many requests... Darling, I can't let you do all of this alone.

Dialogues.Speaker: Zhezhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Dianxiao, it's okay. I'll finish them on time.

Dialogues.Speaker: Dianxiao
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I never doubted that. I know you just pulled all-nighters for another project. It's only been a couple days, you need rest...

Dialogues.Speaker: Dianxiao
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And if you take this job, you'll have to travel around for inspiration… It's not going to be light work.

Dialogues.Speaker: Dianxiao
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Are you sure you'll be alright?

Dialogues.Speaker: Zhezhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Y-yes. Please let me take this job…

Dialogues.Speaker: Zhezhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I... I'll start working right now. Thank you, Dianxiao.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Zhezhi leaves in a hurry.

Dialogues.Speaker: Dianxiao
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Wait, Zhezhi...!

Dialogues.Speaker: Dianxiao
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, hello, {PlayerName}. Are you here to buy a fan?

Options.PlotLineKey: I saw Zhezhi leaving in a rush…

Dialogues.Speaker: Dianxiao
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Well, here's the thing. I set up a fan-drawing stall at the Moonlit Fair and was planning to ask a few of my artist friends to draw some fans.

Dialogues.Speaker: Dianxiao
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But none of our other artists had open slots... I didn't know what to do. Then Zhezhi stepped up to take on all the commissions herself.

Options.PlotLineKey: So many requests to work on…
That sounds like a lot of work.

Dialogues.Speaker: Dianxiao
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Zhezhi never misses deadlines, but I don't want her to overwork herself.

Options.PlotLineKey: Anything I can help you with?

Dialogues.Speaker: Dianxiao
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You're gonna help us? Really? Let me think…

Dialogues.Speaker: Dianxiao
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: How about taking photos of the landscapes she chose? That way, she can just use those photos as references.

Dialogues.Speaker: Dianxiao
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: She can stay home and focus on her art instead of traveling. It'll save her time and energy!

Dialogues.Speaker: Dianxiao
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Can you help us with that? I'll pay you, of course!

Dialogues.Speaker: Dianxiao
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Great! Thank you so much! Zhezhi should be painting peach trees on a slope near Taoyuan Vale right now, so I think you can skip that place.

Dialogues.Speaker: Dianxiao
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Now... We still need pics of the waterfall at Bell-Borne Ravine and the Jinzhou city.

Dialogues.Speaker: Dianxiao
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: When you're finished, please bring them back to me and I'll pass them on to Zhezhi.

Dialogues.Speaker: Dianxiao
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That's a relief. Thank you, Zhezhi will be so happy to have those photos!

Dialogues.Speaker: Dianxiao
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: How did it go, {PlayerName}?

Dialogues.Speaker: Dianxiao
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Fantastic! Great angles, great details. Yes, they would make excellent reference images.

Dialogues.Speaker: Dianxiao
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thank you so much. I'll pass them on to Zhezhi once she's back!

Dialogues.Speaker: Dianxiao
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: See you, {PlayerName}!

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: A few minutes later...

Dialogues.Speaker: Dianxiao
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hey, Zhezhi! Good news!

Dialogues.Speaker: Zhezhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Good news…?

Dialogues.Speaker: Dianxiao
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I suppose you can skip the fieldwork for once. Take a look at this!

Dialogues.Speaker: Zhezhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: These are… reference photos? The Bell-Borne Ravine's waterfall, and panorama view of Jinzhou City...

Dialogues.Speaker: Zhezhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Th-these are exactly what I need… Thank you, Dianxiao!

Dialogues.Speaker: Dianxiao
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No, I'm not the one you should be thanking. A certain kind person volunteered to help.

Dialogues.Speaker: Zhezhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: A kind person...

Dialogues.Speaker: Dianxiao
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yeah, {Male=he;Female=she} took these photos for you. I'd never dare go to places like Bell-Borne Ravine.

Dialogues.Speaker: Zhezhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (Could it be... the person I saw near those peach trees...)

Dialogues.Speaker: Dianxiao
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What's the matter, Zhezhi?

Dialogues.Speaker: Zhezhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: N-nothing! Excuse me, I-I need to work on the painting…!

Dialogues.Speaker: Zhezhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (...I'll be sure to thank {Male=him;Female=her} the next time we meet.)

Dialogues.Speaker: Rover
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: "The waterfall near Bell-Borne Ravine"… This should be the place.

Dialogues.Speaker: Rover
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'll find a good spot for my photo.

Dialogues.Speaker: Rover
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: From here I can see the entirety of the Jinzhou City.

Dialogues.Speaker: Rover
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I should take a photo here.

Dialogues.Speaker: Zhezhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hmm... I should leave more space to make the contrast pop. And perhaps I'll do some wet in wet, add a touch of vermilion here, to bring out the peach trees?

Dialogues.Speaker: Zhezhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No, that might make it too blurry. The customers at the Moonlit Fair prefer more realistic details...

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (Zhezhi seems deeply focused. She should have no problem working on the paintings. I'll get going and do Dianxiao's request…)

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: As you leave, Zhezhi glances back, puzzled.

Dialogues.Speaker: Zhezhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Uh... Did I just see someone out of the corner of my eye?

Dialogues.Speaker: Zhezhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: {Male=He;Female=She} felt... familiar?

Dialogues.Speaker: Zhezhi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Nevermind… I'm probably just seeing things after staying up too late.
